Disinformation Hub

Info Sesh

About

Disinformation Hub is a platform that allows students to use critical thinking to identify and understand mis/disinformation. Built by University of Hawaii at MƒÅnoa students, we hope that our daily challenge game and informational page helps bring more guidance to determining real and fake information online.

Project 1

Dive into the world of deepfakes. Where you will see all of the AI-generated images that look believable, but are actually fake. Broaden your exposure of what is really real/fake and why. What if it's not but you thought it was?

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: Nov 2024
  • Service: Web Development
